trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 與這個自動化對等相關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Hides all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> does not have items in the overflow menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 沒有溢位功能表中的項目。

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，位於與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定之項目的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Displays all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> does not have items in the overflow menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 沒有溢位功能表中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 的狀態 (展開或摺疊)。

trans-unit.source: The state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項型別。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ToolBar" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ToolBar" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 的子項目集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 的子項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定控制項模式的值列舉。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonQuickAccessToolBarAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value, or if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> has items in the overflow menu and <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> 值，或者如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonQuickAccessToolBar" /> 的溢位功能表中有項目且 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" /> 值，則為支援控制項模式的物件；否則為 <see langword="null" />。
